description:
Path of Exile is a free-to-play online action RPG set in a dark, gritty world where you explore, fight monsters,
and collect powerful loot. The game is known for its deep character customization, with an enormous passive skill
tree, thousands of items, and a huge endgame full of challenging bosses, and a wide variety of skill gems that define abilities.

0.0.001.description:
--------



# Path of Exile Archipelago World - Release Notes

## Overview

The Path of Exile Archipelago World integrates Path of Exile with the Archipelago multiworld randomizer. This world randomizes base item types as location checks, allowing you to unlock gear, flask slots, support gem links, character classes, and ascendancies as you progress through the game.

---

## Features

### Core Gameplay

- **Base Item Hunt**: Find specific base item types to check locations in your multiworld  
- **Character Progression**: Unlock new character classes and ascendancies through items  
- **Gear Unlocks**: Unlock better gear rarities (Normal, Magic, Rare, Unique)  
- **Flask Slot Upgrades**: Expand your flask capacity through progression items  
- **Support Gem Links**: Unlock additional gem socket links for more power  

### Audio Integration

- **Text-to-Speech (TTS)**: Automatically generates audio cues for item discoveries  
- **Custom Item Filter**: Dynamic filter generation with sound alerts for unchecked locations  
- **Player Name Integration**: TTS announces which player's item you've found  

### OAuth Integration

- **GGG API Authentication**: Secure login to Path of Exile's official API  
- **Character Validation**: Automatic verification of your character's inventory and equipment  
- **Real-time Updates**: Syncs your in-game progress with the Archipelago server  

---

## Installation & Setup

1. Extract the `.apworld` file to your Archipelago `custom_worlds` folder  
2. Launch the Archipelago client and connect to your multiworld server  
3. Use the built-in Path of Exile client launcher or run the client manually  
4. ???
5. Profit!
---

## Client Commands

The Path of Exile client provides several commands accessible through the Archipelago interface:

### Essential Setup Commands

#### `/set_client_text_path <path>`

- Sets the path to your Path of Exile client log file  
- Run this **after connecting, before launching** `/start_poe`  
- Wrap the path in quotes: `"<PATH>"`  

**Common paths**:
```
C:/Program Files (x86)/Grinding Gear Games/Path of Exile/logs/Client.txt  
C:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/Path of Exile/logs/Client.txt
```

**Example**:
```
/set_client_text_path "C:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/Path of Exile/logs/Client.txt"
```

#### `/char_name <character_name>`

- Sets your current character name for tracking  
- Used for API validation and progress tracking  
- Alternative: Type `!ap char` in-game to set automatically  

**Example**:
```
/poe_char_name "MyCharacterName"
```

#### `/poe_base_item_filter <filter_name>`

- Sets your base item filter file (optional)  
- Must be a local `.filter` file in your Path of Exile folder  (C:\Users\<USER>\Documents\My Games\Path of Exile)
- The Archipelago filter will be layered on top of this  

**Example**:
```bash
/poe_base_item_filter "MyFilter.filter"
```

### Utility Commands

#### `/poe_auth`

- Authenticate with Path of Exile's OAuth2 service  
- Opens a browser window for secure login  
- Required for API features and character validation  
- Tokens are automatically saved and refreshed  

#### `/start_poe`

- Starts the Path of Exile client integration  
- Begins monitoring your client log file  
- Activates item filter generation  
- Enables automatic progress tracking  
- **Prerequisite**: Must set client text path first  

#### `/poe_generate_tts`

- Manually generates TTS audio files for missing locations  
- Useful if TTS generation fails automatically  
- Files saved to: `Documents/My Games/Path of Exile/apsound/`  

---

## Configuration Options

### Character Options

- **Starting Character**: Choose your initial character class (Marauder, Ranger, Witch, etc.)  
- **Allow Other Characters**: Whether you can unlock additional character classes  
- **Ascendancies per Class**: Number of ascendancy options available for each class  

### Progression Options

- **Gear Unlocks**: Enable/disable gear rarity progression  
- **Flask Slot Upgrades**: Enable/disable flask capacity progression  
- **Support Gem Slots**: Enable/disable gem link progression  
- **Gucci Hobo Mode**: Restricts gear quality (1 Normal Item and any Unique, 1 Item of Any rarity, or only uniques)  

### Audio Options

- **Enable TTS**: Turn text-to-speech on/off *(Unimplemented)*  
- **TTS Speed**: Adjust speech rate (words per minute) *(Unimplemented)*  

---

## How It Works

### Location Checking

- The client monitors your Path of Exile log file for zone changes  
- When you enter a new area, it validates your character via the GGG API  
- Your inventory and equipment are checked for base item types  
- Any new base items found trigger location checks in Archipelago  
- The item filter updates to remove found items and highlight remaining ones  

### Item Filter Generation

- Automatically creates `__ap.filter` in your Path of Exile folder  
- Highlights unchecked base item types with custom colors and sounds  
- Integrates with your existing item filter as an overlay  
- Updates in real-time as you find items  

### TTS Integration

- Generates unique audio files for each missing item  
- Announces the player name and item when found  
- Files are cached to avoid regeneration  
- Integrates with the item filter for audio cues  

---

# In-Game Whisper Commands

Once connected, you can whisper yourself in Path of Exile to query your received items. All commands must be sent as whispers to your own character (using `@YourCharacterName` in chat):

---

## Character Setup

### `!ap char`

- Sets your character name automatically  
- Generates a unique verification code  
- Confirms your character identity with the client  
- Must be used before other whisper commands work  

**Usage**: Type `!ap char` in global chat (not as a whisper)

---

## Item Query Commands

### `!main gems` / `!gems`

- Lists all main skill gems you've received  
- Shows active skill gems available to use  
- Sorted by required level (highest first)  
- **Example output**: `Fireball, Ice Nova, Lightning Bolt`

### `!support gems`

- Lists all support gems you've received  
- Shows gems that modify active skills  
- Includes damage, utility, and defensive supports  
- **Example output**: `Melee Physical Damage Support, Added Fire Damage Support`

### `!utility gems`

- Lists all utility skill gems you've received  
- Shows auras, curses, movement skills, and other utility gems  
- **Example output**: `Clarity, Anger, Leap Slam`

### `!all gems` / `!gems`

- Lists all gem types you've received  
- Combines main, support, and utility gems  
- Comprehensive list of all available gems
- This may be hard to make sense of at the moment

### `!gear`

- Lists all gear items you've received  
- Shows unlocked equipment types  
- Includes weapons, armor, and accessories  

### `!weapons`

- Lists all weapon items you've received  
- Shows all unlocked weapon types  
- Includes melee, ranged, and caster weapons  

### `!armor`

- Lists all armor items you've received  
- Shows all unlocked armor pieces  
- Includes helmets, body armor, gloves, boots, and shields  

### `!links`

- Lists all gem link upgrades you've received  
- Shows maximum socket link configurations unlocked  

### `!flasks`

- Lists all flask items you've received  
- Includes flask slot upgrades  

### `!ascendancy`

- Lists all ascendancy classes you've received  
- Shows unlocked specialization classes  
- **Example output**: `Juggernaut, Berserker, Chieftain`

---

## Usage Tips

- All whisper commands require you to have set your character name first with `!ap char`  
- Commands are case-sensitive and must include the `!` prefix  
- Whisper yourself using `@YourCharacterName` command in chat  
- The client will respond with the requested information via whisper  
- This only whispers 500 characters (max whisper size in PoE), so after a bit the lists won't be useful anymore :(


---

## Technical Requirements

- **Path of Exile**: Compatible with current game version  
- **Python 3.8+**: Required for Archipelago client  
- **Internet Connection**: Needed for GGG API authentication  
- **Windows**: Primary platform (others may work but untested)  

---

## Troubleshooting

### Common Issues


#### Item filter not updating

- Ensure client text path is set correctly  
- Verify the log file is being written to by Path of Exile  
- Check that you have write permissions to your Path of Exile folder  

#### Authentication failing

- Run `/poe_auth` to refresh your OAuth token  
- Ensure you're logged into the correct Path of Exile account  
- Check your internet connection  

## Known Issues


- Connecting to wrong slot / player name will cause the client to crash
- Silently fails on bad client.txt path
- Make sure client.txt path is a file, not just a directory
---

## Credits

This world integrates with Path of Exile's official API and follows GGG's terms of service for third-party applications. The TTS system uses Windows Speech Platform for audio generation.

0.0.002.description:
## Fixed in this version:

- There was no goal location
- The item filter must be named normalLocal.filter and AP Filter don't load without a base filter.
- Picky about Client.txt -- the path must point to Client.txt, not the directory
- !ap char won't work with clan tags

- filter updating should not be as sporadic on new zone.
- fixed logging
- better chat command handling

## Added in this version:
- added more chat commands
- added goal options (the last two aren't implemented, but if you can beat this before 0.1.1 Ill buy you a soda)

0.2.0-poe-rc.description:
## Patch notes:
- Generation based off of act goals
    - Rewrote a good portion of generation
- added / renamed options, add levels as locations / items
- "Nice start" option where it will give you the gems and starting item from the beach, based off of your character.
- send a whisper message when out of logic
- generate filter nicely
- item filter should change based on if items are progressive / useful / filter / trap
- validation you are on the right char before sending a goal

## Known issues
- Boss options not generating
- Linux

## Future features
- a stop command maybe?
- highlight items and gems that you can/can't use
- a file selector for client.txt and filters
- A POPTRACKER

This should be compatible with 0.2.0

0.2.2-poe.description:

- Fix check for max links on any item. (any 2 links were valid until now)
- fixed "!usable support gems" crashing

This should be compatible with versions >= 0.2.0
0.2.2-poe.title: poe.apworld 0.2.2

0.3.0-poe.description:
## Patch notes:
- Added categories to the datapackage in ap
- Refactored data tables
- Removed gems that were no longer in the game
- Added better location and region names.
- If there is a crash, we automatically restart the client (Hopefully gracefully!)
- F11 now intentionally crashes (and hopefully restarts) the client
- You should now be able to allocate a passive if you have picked up an item that _would_ give you a point in a zone
- Added a "/stop" client command
- a poptracker exists! : https://github.com/stubobis1/PathOfExilePoptracker/releases/tag/0.1.0

## bug fixes:
- Fixed generation removing all main hand weapon's links if you were using the easy start setting.
- Fixed an error in generation, where it would remove all ascendancies and then crash if you did not allow unlocking of other characters.
- !passive should now no longer lag a zone behind

## Known issues
- Boss options not generating
- Linux

## Future features
- Deathlink
- highlight items and gems that you can/can't use
- a file selector for client.txt and filters


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/stubobis1/Archipelago/compare/0.2.2-poe...0.3.0-poe

0.3.3-poe.title: Archipelago 0.3.3-poe

1.0.0-poe.description:
# Path of Exile (PC)


## What does randomization do to this game?

This `.apworld` does not modify Path of Exile directly, it:
- Reads your character data through an API.
- Reads your PoE client logs.
- Writes to an item filter (and can place audio files) to highlight AP items.
- Checks that you are using the items / gems that you have received. And sends checks when you find new items or level up.

## What items and locations get shuffled?

### Locations (checks)
- Finding certain base item types that drop from monsters (e.g., a specific sword base).
- Leveling up.

### Items (unlocks)
- Available characters
- Ascendancies
- Passive skill points
- Ability to equip certain gear rarities
- Ability to equip flasks
- Maximum allowed number of linked sockets
- Utility gems (auras, movement skills, curses, etc.)
- Skill gems (active attack/spell abilities)
- Support gems (that empower skill gems)


## How It Works (Read-Only Integration)

### Core loop
1. **Enter a zone** → the client validates your current gear and progression.
2. **Pick up items** → The filter should make clear what items will unlock things.
3. **Enter a new zone** → “checks” are sent for newly found items/conditions.

## What does another world's item look like in Path of Exile?
- Items from other players will be highlighted in your item filter.
- If enabled there will be audio cues for what an item will unlock when you pick it up and change zones.

## Options

### Configurable goals
- Finish acts / complete the campaign
- Kill endgame bosses

### Configurable Items

**Characters & Classes:**
- Starting character class (Marauder, Ranger, Witch, Duelist, Templar, Shadow, Scion)
- Additional character unlocks (optional)
- Ascendancy classes (0-3 per character class)

**Equipment & Gear:**
- Gear rarity restrictions (Normal, Magic, Rare, Unique)
- Starting gear allowances (weapon, flask slots, gems)
- Flask slot upgrades (up to 5 total)
- Support gem socket limits (linked sockets for gem combinations)

**Skills & Progression:**
- Passive skill points (can be restricted and unlocked through items)
- Skill gems (active attack/spell abilities)
- Support gems (enhance and modify skill gems)  
- Utility gems (auras, movement skills, curses, buffs)




**Quality of Life:**
- Text-to-Speech announcements for found items
- Configurable TTS speed (50-500 WPM)
- DeathLink integration (share deaths with other players)

**Item Distribution:**
- Minimum items per act (ensures progression isn't completely blocked)
- Gear upgrades, flask slots, and support gem slots distributed per act
- Skill gem availability scaling with acts

**Misc:**
- Gucci Hobo Mode (extreme equipment restrictions - unique items only) -- Would not recommend.

---
Example options:
I want to use my own end-game character, and go from nothing to mapping to a boss.
- Disable levels as checks.
- Enable passive skill points as unlocks.
- Respec my character, removing all passive points, and start with no gear.
- enable boss as a goal
- add my class in the "starting inventory" section.
  ```
    start_inventory:
    # Start with these items.
    {
      "Ascendant": 1,
    }
--- 
## What do I do if I encounter a bug with the game?
- Please reach out to the discord chanel for Path of Exile archipelago
#### OR
- Create an issue here: https://github.com/stubobis1/Archipelago/issues






# Path of Exile Archipelago Setup Guide

---

## 1) Prerequisites

- Path of Exile installed and playable.
- Python 3.12 installed. (Python 3.13 will not work)
- Archipelago (latest release).
- The Path of Exile `.apworld` file from the Path of Exile APWorld release page. (https://github.com/stubobis1/Archipelago/releases)

---

## 2) Download & Install Archipelago

1. Download the latest Archipelago release:
   - https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/releases
2. Install Python if needed:
   - https://www.python.org/downloads/release/python-31210/
3. Extract the Archipelago release to a folder of your choice (e.g., `C:\Games\Archipelago` or `~/Archipelago`).

---

## 3) Add the Path of Exile `.apworld`

1. Download the `.apworld`:
   - https://github.com/stubobis1/Archipelago/releases
2. Place the `.apworld` file into the `Archipelago/custom_worlds/` folder.

---

## 4) Generate / Join a Multiworld

1. Launch `ArchipelagoLauncher.exe` from your Archipelago folder.
2. Generate Template Options
3. Modify `Archipelago/Players/Templates/Path of Exile.yaml` to change options to your liking.
4. Setup a Multiworld session:
  - If self-hosting / playing single player:
    - place the `Path of Exile.yaml` in your Players directory
    - run `ArchipelagoLauncher.exe`
    - Select **Generate Game**.
    - Select **Host**, and select the generated file from `/output`
    - By default the server will run on port `38281`
  - If playing with others:
    - Send your `yaml` to whomever is generating and hosting
    - Get your slot name from the host, and the server address (IP or domain) and port.


---

## 5) Setup Poptracker (Optional but Highly Recommended)

1. Download Poptracker from: https://github.com/black-sliver/PopTracker/releases
2. Extract / Setup Poptracker to a folder of your choice.
3. Download the PoE Archipelago Poptracker pack from: https://github.com/stubobis1/PathOfExilePoptracker/releases
4. Place the zip file into the `poptracker/packs` directory.
5. Launch `PopTracker.exe`.
6. Click on the `AP` button at the top.
7. Enter your slot name and server address from step 4. (Example: `127.0.0.1:38281`, slot `Player1`, no password)
8. If the `AP` button is green you are connected.


---

## 6) Start the Client

1. In `ArchipelagoLauncher.exe` run `Path of Exile` from the client list.
2. Enter the slot name and server address in the top bar 
   - something like `Player1:@127.0.0.1:38281` 
     - (note the `:` after the slot name is where you would put the password, if one was set by the host).
3. Click **Connect**.
4. (optional) Run `/received` to see which class you have received. (not needed if you setup poptracker)
5. Run `/poe_auth` in the client console to authenticate your PoE account.
6. Set the character you will be playing with `/char YourCharacterName`.
7. Set your `client.txt` path by running `/client "C:\PathOfExile\logs\Client.txt"` (adjust path as needed). Note the Quotation marks.
8. Set your item filter path by running `/filter <filterName>.filter` 
    - this should be a local filter, and exist at something like `C:\Users\<USERNAME>\Documents\My Games\Path of Exile`
9. (Optional) Enable or Disable DeathLink with `/deathlink` if you want to share deaths with other players.
10. If you haven't already, Launch Path of Exile and **LOGIN**. 
11. Run `/start` in the client console and enjoy!


---


## 7) In‑Game Chat Commands (Whisper Yourself)

Send whispers **to your own character** using `@YourCharacterName` followed by a command. Example:
```
@YourCharacterName !gems
```

Commands:
```
!ap char                  - Set your character
!deathlink                - Toggle DeathLink
!goal                     - View your current goal
!passive or !p            - List usable passive points
!usable skill gems        - List usable skill gems (by level)
!usable support gems      - List usable support gems
!usable utility gems      - List usable utility gems
!usable gems              - List all usable gems
!main gems                - Show main skill gems received
!support gems             - Show support gems received
!utility gems             - Show utility gems received
!all gems or !gems        - Show all gems received
!gear                     - Show usable gear
!weapons                  - Show usable weapons
!armor                    - Show usable armor
!links                    - Show maximum link allowance
!flasks                   - Show flask unlocks
!ascendancy               - Show unlocked ascendancies
!help                     - Show help message
```

Note: Commands must be whispered to **yourself** (not global chat) using `@YourCharacterName`.

---

## 8) Tips & Troubleshooting

- Keep the Archipelago client running while you play PoE.
- If you pick up an item and no check is sent, **enter a new zone** to trigger a check.
- Make sure your PoE logs are being read (client should detect zone changes and chat whispers).
- If the item filter isn’t changing, run `/filter` in the client console.
- DeathLink: When enabled, your deaths (and others’) can be shared as events across players.
- OAuth/API: Ensure your PoE account is properly authenticated if the client needs character data from the API.

---

## 9) Quick Start Summary

1. Install Python (3.12) and Archipelago.
2. Drop the PoE `.apworld` into `Archipelago/custom_worlds/`.
3. Use the Launcher to generate or connect to a multiworld.
4. Start playing PoE with the client open.
5. Whisper yourself for status/info commands and change zones to send checks.

---

Happy mapping, and good luck with your drops!




(patch notes)
- added `!goal`
- fixed `!flasks`
- fixed max links for gloves and boots
- Fixed error on startup, better handling of socket errors
- stopped opening up 1 billion webpages for auth.
1.0.0-poe.title: Path of Exile apworld 1.0.0

- Added a "Starting character" note on connecting

## Bug fixes:

- Fixed chat message when you defeat a boss

1.0.2-poe.description:
## Bug fixes:
- Fixed generation with more than 1 poe player, with different options.
- Fixed a bug related to max links, logic only accounted for 21, instead of 22.
- Fixed bugs related to linked items and other generation because of creation of boss items.
1.0.2-poe.title: Path of Exile apworld 1.0.2

1.0.3-poe.description:
## Patch notes:
- Added support for full paths in the client /filter command
- Chat commands (!help) are now case-insensitive
- Fixed webworld, in preparation for possible hosting on multiworld.gg
- Better logging on client side.
- Allow equipping eye jewels in equipment

## Bug fixes:
- Fixed a crash on receiving a Deathlink
- Fixed another crash on logging a Deathlink
1.0.3-poe.title: Path of Exile apworld 1.0.3

1.0.4-poe.description:
# This release has had many bug reports. I am looking into it now. Use https://github.com/stubobis1/Archipelago/releases/tag/1.0.3-poe for now.

## Patch notes:
- Changed how the vendor directory is handled.
    - This will allow the poe code to be built in an archipelago install.
- Updated to 0.6.4 main codebase.
- Updated Readme / setup guide
- Refactored Options to make them more readable.
    - Added Option Groups
    - Added Option Presets

## Bug fixes:
- Fixed "/enable_tts" to actually work.
- Fixed logging of starting character not appearing until second connection.

## NOTES:

- If you are having trouble with the client writing to files, it could be microsoft one drive causing problems, maybe disable that?
- If you get any virus warning -- PLEASE let me know. Microsoft flagged this falsely (I submitted it to their team and they categorized it as a false positive)


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/stubobis1/Archipelago/compare/1.0.3-poe...1.0.4-poe
1.0.4-poe.title: Archipelago 1.0.4-poe (UNSTABLE)

1.0.5-poe.description:
## Bug fixes:
- Possibly fixed a timeout with TTS generation, breaking item filter generation
- Fixed an issue where culling of progressive passive points would be broken with more than one instance of POE
- Better logging



**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/stubobis1/Archipelago/compare/1.0.4-poe...1.0.5-poe
1.0.5-poe.title: 1.0.5-poe (unstable?)

1.1.0-poe.description:
## There is a bug with this release when running from `.apworld` if you run it from source it will work.

## Patch notes:
- Added "progressive gear" mode.
  - Options for fully progressive, non-unique progressive, and non-progressive gear.
  - You should be albe to still add items to the starting inventory, and still be using progressive gear.
- Added a "Jingle" sound mode for the item filter.
  - based off of @NewSoupVi 's jingles (thank you!)
- Added options for item filter display
  - showing item classification 
  - hiding item classification
  - randomizing display
- Added Vaal gems and Alternate Gems to the item pool.
- Added options
  - Add support gems to item pool
  - Add skill gems to item pool
  - minimum support gems per act
  - disable generation logic
- We check for number of available weapons and armor for act 1 accessibility, instead of requireing 2 normal weapons and 2 normal armor.
  - Generation is better
  - This means that the generation works with either progressive or non-progressive gear mode.
- renamed "Twilight Strand" to "early act 1" to avoid confusion.
- changed "Out of Logic" to "Invalid State"
- Linux fixes
  - Changed pygetwin to pywinctrl (This should fix some linux issues)
  - Added a client command to change the poe documents path.
  - Linux is still a work in progress, but there _is_ progress.


## Bug fixes:
- Added logging for incompatible versions
- No longer sends checks if in an invalid state.
- Item filter should still write if it can't find tts wav files.
- Fixed a bug where every poe item was marked as progressive (the items would still be generated correctly, but it would show them all as progressive)
- Fixed winreg on non-windows systems.
- Fixed a _TON_ of generation issues (Thanks @eijebong for the fuzzer!! It was super helpful!)


## NOTES:
- rewrote a lot of the generation logic, validation logic and client code, so there may be new bugs.
- Added a bunch of unit tests, but there may still be edge cases.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/stubobis1/Archipelago/compare/1.0.5-poe...1.1.0-poe
1.1.0-poe.title: Path of Exile apworld 1.1.0

1.1.1-poe.description:
## Bug fixes:
- Fixed a major crash when running it from the `apworld` instead of source.
    - This was related to vendor_modules.zip . I also added a version check for the lib so new versions should get new vendor_module directories.
1.1.1-poe.title: Archipelago 1.1.1-poe

1.1.2.description:
## Bug fixes:
- Fixed a major bug when trying to write wave files for TTS

### Backwards compatible with worlds generated with 1.1.0 and 1.1.1
1.1.2.title: Archipelago 1.1.2

1.1.3.description:
## Bug fixes:
- Fixed text update when using progressive unlock mode
- Added progressive weapon instead of normal weapon when using progressive unlock mode and starting gear
- Fixed `/poe_documents_directory`
- Fixed progressive fishing rods

### Backwards compatible with worlds generated with 1.1.0 - 1.1.2

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/stubobis1/Archipelago/compare/1.1.2...1.1.3
1.1.3.title: Archipelago 1.1.3

1.1.4.description:
## Bug fixes:
- Fixed trap styling
- Better handling of finding the documents folder on Windows.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/stubobis1/Archipelago/compare/1.1.3...1.1.4
1.1.4.title: Archipelago 1.1.4

1.1.5.description:
## Bug fixes:
- Added support for Universal Tracker
- Fixed a bunch of generation issues (It can still fail, rarely -- if you encounter this try again)
- Fixed an error where multiple poe players would get options mixed on generation
- Updated the `readme.md` (Thanks DonChalant)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/stubobis1/Archipelago/compare/1.1.4...1.1.5
1.1.5.title: Archipelago 1.1.5

1.2.0.description:
# Support for 3.27!
## Patch notes:
This patch is _not_ backwards compatible. 
- 3.27 support
	- Added gems from 3.27
	- Removed wands that are no longer obtainable
	- Ignoring the breach graph equipment slot (for now, if this is too easy I can change)
	- Also ignoring the high end base item types of:
		- Cryonic Ring  
		- Enthalpic Ring  
		- Formless Ring  
		- Fugitive Ring  
		- Organic Ring  
		- Synaptic Ring
	
- Added a client option to whisper when you receive items.
	- Toggle this in the client with "/whisper_updates"
	- This option should persist across sessions, and should not rewhisper on connection
  
- modified default `.yaml` settings
	- starting_weapon_flask_and_gems is now default
		- The game now won't yell at you with default settings at the start of the run, for not unequiping things
	- all normal gear is not unlocked by default


## Bug fixes:
- Rewrote the system for queuing messages sent to the player.
- Made the text commands for `!gear` much better.
- More verbose messaging for the player to understand what happened when something isn't working.
	- in logs, in the client, and in the whispers
- Refactored generation logic.
- Fixed generation issue where no items would be placed in act 10
- Generation time has been cut in half (thanks to some profiling with snakevis and memoization)
- Fixed some other generation bugs



## NOTES:
- There may be new bugs. Please let me know if you have problems!!
- New poptracker for this release, here: https://github.com/stubobis1/PathOfExilePoptracker/releases/tag/1.2.0



**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/stubobis1/Archipelago/compare/1.1.5...1.2.0
1.2.0.title: Path of Exile apworld 1.2.0 (now with 3.27 support!)

1.2.1.description:
## Patch notes:
- This will work with 1.2.0, but 1.2.0 will not work with worlds generated with 1.2.1
- 🎉Generation now should no longer fail🎉
- Generation now ensures that a movement skill will be placed early
- Added exceptional gems. (Enhance, Empower, Enlighten)
	
## Bug fixes:
- Fixed boss drops with ilvls not triggering betting the boss
- Fixed the char name being loaded from a past run.
- Fixed whisper_updates not sending items that have more than 1 count.
- Fixed Cleave not having the correct weapons required, and breaking any generation that required cleave
- Removed duplicate jingle .wav files, making the apworld smaller.


## NOTES:
- There may be new bugs. Please let me know if you have problems!!
- Did some refactoring.
- New poptracker for this release, here: https://github.com/stubobis1/PathOfExilePoptracker/releases/tag/1.2.1


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/stubobis1/Archipelago/compare/1.2.0...1.2.1

- Info:
    - https://ap.stripesoo7.org/games/Path%20of%20Exile/info/en
- Setup guide:
    - https://ap.stripesoo7.org/tutorial/Path%20of%20Exile/setup_en

- If you want to use a UI to generate a YAML, You can generate do so here:
    - https://ap.stripesoo7.org/games/Path%20of%20Exile/player-options
    - https://multiworld.gg/games/Path%20of%20Exile/player-options

1.2.1.title: Path of Exile Archipelago 1.2.1
